description: Jay Cloud is just trying to take a leak, simultaneously daydreaming of something sex-like and special. Along comes Jordan Foster, who needs to check himself out in the mirror. In no time at all, Jordan is checking out something else entirely, namely, Jay's big meatstick. Watch as the two of them fuck, suck & ?drain the main vein? together.  Enjoy!
title: TWINKLE TINKLE
